name: SWEETDOZER
description:
BASIC INFO

in this score attack game you accumulate points by moving as many sweets as possible to the goal. there is a time limit which begins at 20 seconds, but as you continue to score you gain extra time to reach even higher scores. if you clear out the field with time to spare don't worry, because more candies and pastries are coming.

if you encounter glitches or any other problems with this game comment below or e-mail me at tk [@] dreckrealm.com. you do not have to pay to experience the embedded version of this game above, but standalone downloads for windows, mac and linux are available if you pay a minimum of 2 USD for them. any donations are appreciated.

CONTROLS

arrow keys - movement (note: there is diagonal movement.)
